title: Man Facepalming

verbs: To bring the palm of one's hand to one's face as an expression of mixed humor and disbelief or disgust or shame, for example, when one is caught off-guard with a particularly bad pun.
Bring the face to the palm of the hand.
To bring one's face down to one's cupped hand or hands.
Bring the palm of the hand to the face.
nouns: Doubt, a status between belief and disbelief, involves uncertainty or distrust or lack of sureness of an alleged fact, an action, a motive, or a decision.
Doubt is uncertainty in the context of trust, action, decision or belief.
The state of being unsure of something
A status between belief and disbelief, involves uncertainty or distrust or lack of sureness of an alleged fact, an action, a motive, or a decision
Challenge about the truth or accuracy of a matter.
The state of being dubious.
Uncertainty, disbelief.
Sexual maturity is the age or stage when an organism can reproduce.
The age or stage when an organism can reproduce
An adult male human.
A man is a male human.
An adult male human
An adult human member of the sex that begets young by fertilizing ova.
A human member of the masculine sex or gender.
An adult person who is male (as opposed to a woman)
A gesture of bringing one palm or both palms to the face, with various interpretations.
A facepalm is the physical gesture of placing one's hand flat across one's face or lowering one's face into one's hand or hands.
Bring the palm of the hand to the face.
A state of physical and/or mental weakness and a lack of vigor.
Fatigue is a subjective feeling of tiredness which is distinct from weakness, and has a gradual onset.
Exhaustion, fatigue or tiredness
A weariness caused by exertion; exhaustion.
Tiredness; fatigue
Temporary loss of strength and energy resulting from hard physical or mental work
Range of afflictions, usually associated with physical and/or mental weakness
Any one of several other medical conditions that cause lethargy
Exhaustion, fatigue or tiredness.
The state of being tired.

description: A hand shown pressing against the head of a man, commonly written as facepalm. Used to display frustration or embarrassment at the ineptitude of a person or situation.
apple_vendor_description: Apple's man facepalming emoji captures a universal moment of exasperation or disbelief with a subtle yet expressive gesture. The character's face, rendered with Apple's soft rounded edges and realistic lighting, conveys a clear sense of being overwhelmed or regretful. This emoji is frequently used on Apple devices to signify utter dismay, a realization of a mistake, or a feeling of 'I can't believe this is happening.'
